item.description:
The Smurfs (2021):

Synopsis:
The CG-animated series marks the return of the globally renowned characters to television for the first time in nearly 40 years. Blue and small, and standing only three apples tall, The Smurfs — Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Hefty, Clumsy and the other inhabitants of Smurf Village — embark upon rousing adventures, packed with humor, heart and high-stakes action.
